snippet: The mistake raises questions about the company’s increasingly criticized system for measuring TV audiences.
abstract: Nielsen acknowledges that it has been reporting inaccurate ratings for broadcast networks for last seven months, mistake that raises questions about company's increasingly criticized system for measuring TV audiences.

byline.original: By BILL CARTER and EMILY STEEL

lead_paragraph: The mistake raises questions about the company’s increasingly criticized system for measuring TV audiences.

headline.main: TV Ratings by Nielsen Had Errors for Months
headline.print_headline: TV Ratings by Nielsen Had Errors for Months
